newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Aristocrat names new North America chief.
newsitem.headline: Aristocrat names new North America chief.

text.p: Gaming machine manufacturer Aristocrat Leisure Ltd said on Tuesday it had appointed Dean McClain as president and chief executive of its U.S. and Canada operations, replacing Andre Hilliou.
Aristcrat said McClain would be based at the company's U.S. headquarters in Reno, Nevada, and would have full responsibility for all aspects of the group's U.S. management.
Aristocrat started in U.S. distribution operations in 1993 and recently commenced manufacturing. The company holds gaming licences in 55 jurisdictions in 23 countries.
The company's U.S. subsidiary, Aristocrat Inc holds gaming licences or authorisations in 12 states and 21 Tribal Gaming Commissions in the U.S. and two provinces in Canada.
